tool.name: bcftools @EXECUTABLE@

param.name: genotypes
param.label: Genotypes to compare against
param.help: (-g) Checks sample identity or wehn omitted a multi-sample cross-check is performed

param.name: target_sample
param.label: Target Sample
param.help: Target sample in the -g file (used only for plotting)

param.name: homs_only
param.label: Homs Only
param.help: Homozygous genotypes only (useful for low coverage data)

param.name: query_sample
param.label: Query Sample
param.help: Query sample (by default the first sample is checked)
